The story of

our journey

Van Vuong Corporation was established in Vietnam by Ly Nha Ky, the first Vietnamese tourism ambassador, an successfull businesswoman, an well-known actress and a social charity activist.

Van Vuong Corperation constantly expand and develop in Real Estate Business & Investment Consultant,
Jewelery & Fashion, Media & Entertainment, Charity & Society, with a vision to become a multinational with sustainable development strategy.

Founder

Ly Nha Ky is the President and CEO of LYNK Group, headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and has good business relations with most of the major corporations in the world. In the Vietnamese market, as the economy develops and the upper classes begin to form, LYNK GROUP has quickly seized the opportunity, successfully distributing the products of world famous jewelery brands, such as de Grisogono, Paolo Piovan, Crivelli Gioielli and Staurino.

In the Asian region, Ly Nha Ky is also known as a dynamic social activist, directing and contributing to many charitable funds. She is the Chairman of the Sheen Hok International Charity Foundation and Vice President of Sheen Hok World. Currently, Ly Nha Ky is the founder and President of the Vietnam Health Development Fund (HEDF).

Being known as a movie star in more than 20 films, but in recent years Ms. Ly Nha Ky has gradually retired from the showbiz to spend time for business and volunteer activities.

Investment & consultant

With extensive experience and extensive relationships in the country as well as internationally, LYNK GROUP has gained a lot of success in the field of investment consulting and advisory for many projects cooperating with large corporations in Vietnam. South and Asian countries.

Jewelry & Fashion

Kim Hoan Company is proud to be the pioneer in bringing the world's leading jewelery brand closer to Vietnam, a destination for the Vietnamese and global elite, the luxury jewelry brand of LYNK. Jewelry includes: de Grisogono, Paolo Piovan, Crivelli Gioielli, and Staurino.

LYNK Fashion is a place where converging many world-class fashion brands from fashionable brands to high-end fashion lines such as Zuhair Murad, Alexis Mabille, Alberta Ferretti, Georges Hobeika, Marchesa. , Peet Dullaer ... The famous brands around the world are present at LYKN Fashion is always the politicians, First Lady, the international royal, the world's favorite stars for many years.
